A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi isn’t a perfect movie\, but it was willing to take chances and not play into the desires of fanboys. The movie could have been shorter\, but that has been true of most Star Wars movies. Comparing this to Rouge One isn’t fair because everyone knew how that had to end. We have reached the point where some Star Wars fans will never be happy\, no matter what happens in one of these films.
